name: Demo Order
description:
This unit’s battalion uses its action to destroy up to 5 connecting player created tiles starting from target tile in Range 0-1 of one of its deployed units, then chooses one mode:
* Create a @{tile::Fortification} in an empty space at Range 1 for 10 of employer’s SP.
* Create a @{tile::Turret} in an empty space at Range 1 for 4 of employer’s SP.
* Create a @{tile::Fire Patch} in an empty space at Range 1 for 2 of employer’s SP.
* Create a @{tile::Smoke Screen} in an space within Range 0-1 for 4 of employer’s SP.
The SP cost is reduced by twice the number of tiles destroyed before it was created.
